title: Crown Heights Community Festival
description: A gathering for the Jewish and black majority from Crown Heights!!! We were actively decorating and setting up the event, but after we weren't needed and we just ended up doing tag. We got some free stuff as well, and it was the first time all our execs could attend 1 event.

title: Serving Mother Nature
description: An event for helping out at our school's local park. We helped out with cleaning up the park and weeding the weeds to help young trees. And serving near Brooklyn Tech as well.

title: Serving Mother Nature (2)
description: An event for helping out at our school's local park. We helped out with cleaning up the park and weeding the weeds to help young trees. And serving near Brooklyn Tech as well.

title: STOOPS
description: A block party dedicated to celebrating young black artists in the community. We helped out with setting up and cleaning up, and we also got to enjoy the event.

title: A modest start
description: Our club started its journey at this Crown St block party, where we just helped out with setting up and there wasn't much to do, but it was a start.
